NYC Lean Coffee http://nyc.leancoffee.org Site for the NYC Lean/Kanban Meetup, organized with a Lean Coffee format Sun, 21 Oct 2012 19:36:41 +0000 en-US hourly 1 http://wordpress.org/?v=3.4.2 Sign up still open for Kaizen Camp: NYC http://nyc.leancoffee.org/2012/10/21/sign-up-still-open-for-kaizen-camp-nyc/ http://nyc.leancoffee.org/2012/10/21/sign-up-still-open-for-kaizen-camp-nyc/#comments Sun, 21 Oct 2012 19:36:41 +0000 Jonathan Hansen http://nyc.leancoffee.org/?p=14 It’s not too late to sign up for Kaizen Camp: NYC. The “unconference” will take place on November 13 and 14. If you like Lean Coffee, you’ll love Kaizen Camp. Click here to sign up.

]]> http://nyc.leancoffee.org/2012/10/21/sign-up-still-open-for-kaizen-camp-nyc/feed/ 0 Jim Benson, co-creator of Personal Kanban + Lean Coffee Meeting http://nyc.leancoffee.org/2012/10/21/jim-benson-co-creator-of-personal-kanban-lean-coffee-meeting/ http://nyc.leancoffee.org/2012/10/21/jim-benson-co-creator-of-personal-kanban-lean-coffee-meeting/#comments Sun, 21 Oct 2012 18:37:22 +0000 Jonathan Hansen http://nyc.leancoffee.org/?p=6 Continue reading →]]> This will not be one to miss!

We will lead off with a talk for 15 minutes or so by Jim Benson, co-author of Personal Kanban, followed by our typical Lean Coffee format (which Jim also co-created).

Sign up on our Meetup page: http://www.meetup.com/nyc-kanban/events/87396772/

When: October 30, 2012
